channel.title: [SFM] JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure Part 5 Golden Wind Forum Mafia- Enemy Stand Users Win!
channel.description:
##
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind Mafia
![image|690x426](upload://fUM8P7AtAKyMoDMYT8psdL8hBXe.jpeg) #####
Hosted by @DatBird and @Geyde. @Shurian as VC Bot
# Rules and Punishments [Standard FOL/FM Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) [details="Spoiler"] >|Rule|Punishment| >|---|---| >|Don't Cheat|Don't discuss the game outside of the thread under ANY circumstances.| >|Quoting game pertinent info Outside of Main Thread|Will be punished severely.| >|Inactivity|Prods will be issued out after 24 hours of inactivity. 12 hours after this you may be force replaced. Notify mod in case this cannot be met for any reason.| >|Intentional Angleshooting|Heavy offense.| >|Unintentional Angleshooting|Will be punished. This applies to pinging a player in thread to be active when knowing they are online.| >|Announcing intention to sub out in the main thread|The literal opposite of okay. Will be punished SEVERELY.| >|Talking to Game Host in Thread / Related Chats|Do not do it, as you will not get a response.| >|Talking to Game Host through PMs|Do this.| >|Quoting Private Communications|Even if it is fabricated, this is strictly against the rules. This includes copy pasting mod messages. Paraphrasing is allowed.| >|Reporting|Discussing substitutions is considered unintentional angleshooting. Don't discuss infractions of these rules, but you may report infractions in your role card.| >|On the Fence|Don't try to skate the line between bending the rules.| [/details] # General Mechanics * Actions are done by messaging in your class card * Enemy Stand Users/Mafia members will talk through a special Discord server or forum page. * There will be both logs and flips. * Starting from Day 2, ITAs will be enabled called Stand Barrages They have a base 15% chance to hit, unless stated otherwise. To use one type **/ITA Player** or **/Stand Barrage Player** or **/shoot Player** and ping me * The host has a right to remain silent regarding any questions about the setup, passives, etc to stop angle shooting. * If anything broken is ever found, I shall fix it regardless of your complaints. * Bleeding, Poisoned, Injured are all interchangeable and will inform you how many days you have to live. ## General Scheduling * Rolecards will be sent out within a day of the game filling. Confirmations will be done in the rolecards only. * The game will start both once all players have 'checked in' and the Danganronpa FM game has concluded * Phases will be 48/24. * Lynches will be Majority & Plurality * Players should post at least 10 times per day phase. If this cannot be met for a particular reason, the mod should be informed in your role PM. Prods will be sent out in rolecards. ## Game Specific Mechanics * This game is not bastard. * There are slight bastard elements. * There is no conversion. * This game is not multiball. * There may be neutrals. * There are no vanilla roles * There may or may not be anti-claim mechanics. * Your starting Neighborhood that you may be in may contain players of different alignments * [**Reasonable Action Resolution**](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Reasonable_Action_Resolution) will be used to handle disputes on the same tier in [**Natural Action Resolution**](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Natural_Action_Resolution). * All flavor is not Alignment Indicative. Try to flavor solve at your own risk. * Only investigative roles and abilities will have feedback (such as being roleblocked / redirected) unless explicitly stated otherwise. They will not know who they were redirected to. * There is the requiem stand arrow in play, it will power you up. Every character has their own version of using it and gets new/expanded powers due to it. You can use it at any point once you retrieve it and it does not stop you from using other abilities during that day/night phase. People will be notified when a requiem stand is activated. You cannot pass the arrow to anyone else unless you die. When you die if you are holding the arrow if one person killed you, they get the arrow, but if you die by a lynch. A random person who was voting you will receive the arrow **Rolelist:** This is a closed setup game. [color=b26edb]**JoBros**[/color] are the good faction. Their goal is: [color=b26edb]*Defeat all the Enemy Stand Users*[/color] [color=hotpink]**Enemy Stand Users**[/color] are the evil faction. Their goal is: [color=hotpink]*Gain Majority over the JoBros*[/color] Neutrals, if any are present, will be assigned their own win condition not listed here [details="Example Rolecard"] > # [color=b26edb]Jotaro Kujo[/color] > > ![|515x782](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/3ppoItod6eRM3CaK9txikMdGk4bby22Zw22F_5x8W1xolCPpgk4c_VRGtnOzFXLtita1MRcduk5uJW3YHngs1s8M52IHoxOmpL29k5JJopJL6yxgm2vOR546cS7fIYEQiaOABdvT) > > ## JoBro, Other, Dolphin Expert > > ### *Dolphins…. WAIT Kakyoin why do you have an egg.* > > **Star Platinum (Passive):** Every time someone makes a dolphin joke or says Ora Ora. Your ITA chance will increase by 5%. But if anyone starts talking about bad dads your ITA chance goes to 0% > > **Star Finger (Day): Poke target player.** They will be informed they were hit by the Star Finger. (infinite uses) > > **STAR PLATINUM THE WORLD (Day):** Stop the game for 5 seconds. Anyone who posts in those five seconds will be ORA Ora’ed right out of the game. (10 uses) > > **Research (Night):** Learn if the target player is a Dolphin. If they are you will see their whole class card (infinite uses) > > **Take Care of Daughter (Night):** Take care of your Daughter (0 uses) > > **Star Platinum Requiem (Day/Night):** if you hold the requiem Arrow, and use it on yourself, Star Finger can now be used 3 times a day. STAR PLATINUM THE WORLD now only works for 3 seconds. This doesn’t prevent you from using other day/night abilities if used. Otherwise, the arrow goes to your killer or a random lyncher if you hold it upon death. (Only useable with requiem arrow) > > [color=b26edb] *Defeat Enemy Stand Users* [/color] [/details] ## Playerlist: 1. SirDerpsAlot 2. [color= hotpink]~~Marshal~~ - Died Day 2 Diavolo and King Crimson[/color] 3. [color= b26edb]~~Arete~~ - Died Day 1 Bruno Buccellati and Sticky Fingers[/color] 4. [color= b26edb]~~Poisonedsquid~~ - Died Day 3 Trish Una and Spice Girl[/color] 5. Luxy and Kai_5 6. TrustworthyLiberal 7. [color= b26edb]~~Possessed~~ - Died Day 2 Scollippi and Rolling Stones[/color] 8. [color= hotpink]~~Eevee~~ - Died Night 1 Squalo and Clash[/color] 9. [color=b26edb]~~Boss110~~ - Died Night 2 Pesci and Beachboy [/color] 10. PokemonKidRyan 11. [color=hotpink]~~Lastday3312~~ - Died Day 3 Illuso and Man in the Mirror [/color] 12. [color=b26edb]~~Astand~~ - Died Night 2 Ghiaco and White Album [/color] 13. [color=b26edb]~~Hippolytus~~ - Died Day 3 Rissoto Nero and Metallica [/color] 14. [color=b26edb]~~Jgoesgaming~~ - Lynched Day 2 Sale and Kraftwork [/color] 15. Italy 16. [color= hotpink]~~Universal~~ - Died Night 1 Guido Mista and Sex Pistols[/color] 17. [color= hotpink]~~Hock3yforlif322 -> Icibalus ~~ - Lynched Day 3 Panocotta Fugo and Purple Haze[/color] 18. [color= b26edb]~~Nuclear_Rehab~~ - Died Day 1 Giorno Giovanna and Gold Experience[/color] 19. [color= b26edb]~~supermegagirl818 -> Shurian~~ - Died Night 1 Leone Abbacchio and Moody Blues[/color] 20. [color= b26edb]~~Insanity~~ - Lynched Day 1 Coco Jumbo and Mr. President[/color] 21. [color= Cyan]~~Memesky~~ - Died Day 2 Leaky Eye Luca and SPQR Shovel[/color] 22. Evil Ginger 23. [color= b26edb]~~snoromlol - > Zone_Q11~~ - Died Night 3 Melone and Baby Face[/color] 24. [color= b26edb]~~Kyle20~~ - Died Night 1 Tiziano and Talking Head[/color] 25. [color= b26edb]~~Loser-> HTM~~ - Died Day 2 Jean Pierre Polnareff and Silver Chariot[/color] 26. [color= b26edb]~~Limestone~~ - Died Night 1 Narancia Ghirga and Aerosmith[/color] 27. [color= b26edb]~~Mist1422~~ - Died Night 3 Prosciutto and the Grateful Dead[/color] 28. [color=hotpink]~~BlueStorm -> Sulit -> NinjaPenguin~~ - Died Day 3 Cioccolata and Green Day [/color] 29. [color= b26edb]~~Emilia~~ - Died Day 2 Secco and Oasis[/color] ### Backups: 1. Discobot ### Spectators: 1. orangeandblack5 2. Firekitten 3. MaximusPrime ## Links: [D1 Arete Already Assassinated](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-28-29-day-1-arete-already-assinated/79862/415?u=datbird) [D1 Giornos Theme stops playing](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-26-29-night-1-dead-turtle-and-need-replacements/79862/2260?u=datbird) [EOD1 Who kills a Turtle? U Monsters](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-26-29-night-1-dead-turtle-and-need-replacements/79862/2964?u=datbird) [SOD2 A Bloodbath of Scum and Town](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-18-29-night-1-leaky-eye-memesky-down-2-replacements-needed/79862/2970?u=datbird) [D2 Marshal is the BOSS?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-18-29-night-1-leaky-eye-memesky-down-2-replacements-needed/79862/3010?u=datbird) [D2 Rip the Fate of Death](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-18-29-night-1-leaky-eye-memesky-down-2-replacements-needed/79862/3020?u=datbird) [D2 Leaky Eye Memesky Crys in the Sky](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-18-29-night-1-leaky-eye-memesky-down-2-replacements-needed/79862/3229?u=datbird) [D2 Dat confirmed Neut?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-18-29-day-2-leaky-eye-memesky-down/79862/4082) [D2 Is that an Arrow?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-jojo-s-bizare-adventure-part-5-golden-wind-forum-mafia-16-29-day-2-is-that-an-arrow/79862/4757?u=datbird) # DO NOT POST YET! # Game begin roughly around [date=2019-12-20 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] but wont start until I give the official go!
